trans-unit.source: Contains a cache of XML Schema definition language (XSD) and XML-Data Reduced (XDR) schemas.
trans-unit.target: Contiene una cache di XML Schema definition language (XSD) e schemi XDR (XML-Data Reduced).

trans-unit.source: The XmlSchemaCollection class class is obsolete.
Schemas are loaded using the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection.Add%2A> method, at which time the schema is associated with a namespace Uniform Resource Identifier (URI).
trans-unit.target: Gli schemi vengono caricati utilizzando il <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection.Add%2A>(metodo), ora in cui lo schema è associato a uno spazio dei nomi Uniform Resource Identifier (URI).</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: For XML Schemas, this will typically be the `targetNamespace` property of the schema.
trans-unit.target: Per gli schemi XML, in genere si tratterà il `targetNamespace` proprietà dello schema.

trans-unit.source: Although this class stores both XML Schemas and XDR schemas, any method and property that takes or returns an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> applies to XML Schemas only.
trans-unit.target: Sebbene questa classe archivi sia schemi XDR e schemi XML, tutti i metodi e proprietà che accettano o restituiscono un <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>si applica solo a XML Schema.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: This version of the product supports the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) XML Schema recommendation located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-1 and http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2.
trans-unit.target: Questa versione del prodotto supporta la raccomandazione del World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) XML Schema disponibile all'indirizzo http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-1 e http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2.

trans-unit.source: An XML Schema must reference the W3C Schema namespace `http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema` in its schema element.
trans-unit.target: Lo spazio dei nomi dello Schema W3C deve fare riferimento a uno Schema XML `http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema` nell'elemento dello schema.

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection.Add%2A> method for an example.
`XmlSchemaCollection` can be used by <xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader> for efficient data validation.
trans-unit.target: `XmlSchemaCollection`può essere utilizzato da <xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader>per la convalida dei dati efficiente.</xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > The XmlSchemaCollection class is obsolete in the Microsoft .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> class.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > XmlSchemaCollection la classe è obsoleta in Microsoft .NET Framework versione 2.0 ed è stata sostituita dalla <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>classe.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlSchemaCollection" name="XmlSchemaCollection" href=""></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlSchemaCollection" name="XmlSchemaCollection" href=""> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection> class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> class.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT]> La <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection>classe è obsoleta in .NET Framework versione 2.0 ed è stata sostituita dalla <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>classe.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection>
